Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: nichole b
Reviews.Content: beach views amazing unlike hotels quiet bike week spacious beds pretty comfortable 3 children 3 grown adults day drive crazy refrigerator stove features pool nice dirty pools seen overall stay recommend vacation 20 minutes nearest highway thumbs

Reviews.Title: “The room was wonderful, newly redone, very clean, great view of the Ocean and in a good location.”
Reviews.Author: Michelle C
Reviews.Content: enjoyed staying 518 castaways wonderful newly redone clean view ocean location hope able future visits daytona especially liked manager site office day knowing security personnel added assurance nice seeing maintenance people moping front office day building kept enjoyed realty feel treated thanks bob barbara garrett

Reviews.Title: “Voted Biggest DUMP in daytona beach !”
Reviews.Author: Kate j
Reviews.Content: im currently renting nov 1st 2011 filled nosey farts sit lobby day night gossip snoop day trying complain hallways smell bad im convinced women died broken pay 50 month internet front desk doesnt passcode sign cant bums scour laundry cause entries unlocked times dryers dirty alive sense washing cloths owners dont front forget looks pictures online maybe 1970s game restaurant 10 minutes road infested tow cars night 2am cars marked registration sign forget stay lying condemned

Reviews.Title: “great getaway”
Reviews.Author: prozzero
Reviews.Content: wife pleased service cleanliness hotel balcony ocean view refrigerator microwave walking distance cool minature golf course ice cream minutes street staff able answer questions provide clean towels cool clean quiet nice city relax beach

Reviews.Title: “I couldn't have asked for a better vacation”
Reviews.Author: christinab_08
Reviews.Content: stayed condo 606 friend week condo size clean comfortable beach outside door perfect woman manages condo friendly offered price daytona beach city plenty couldnt vacation

Reviews.Title: “Guest Relations HORRID”
Reviews.Author: thunderstruckIam
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel past 1st time owners wife course guest relations short medusa stingy towels wont trash amenities list lie drunks hallways trying guests garbage urine smell steps lead beach sad nice families budget

Reviews.Title: “Great time”
Reviews.Author: wb51Orlando
Reviews.Content: family stayed 2010 days wonderful time clean staff extremely helpful price thankyou time staying time

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: Buffy80
Reviews.Content: stayed oceanfront floor kitchenette nice walk sandals family beach quality time issues price summer payed 4000 night 10000 dollars night worth 4000 pay 10000

Reviews.Title: “Great Price, Great Location, Beautiful Beach, and Wonderful Staff!”
Reviews.Author: d1xiegrl
Reviews.Content: va april 5 drove night arrived 800am morning stopped hotel front desk staff friendly told cleaned soon cleaning staff arrived issued parking passes allowed pool available gentleman staff pool available check inwhich wonderful considerate due exhausted drive adults stayed north building clean spacious view ocean front desk staff wonderful hotel management tell doing bar site pina coladas yummy food prices stay recommend hotel friends price cant beat location honestly hotel staff truly wonderful kudos castaways beach resort
